edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc

Class Pipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc.Pipeline

  • public class Pipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a string of algorithms for processing data points. New data is pushed into the pipeline and the next processed point pops out. Algorithms can be added, removed, or swapped.
    Author:
    Haley Garrison

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pipeline()
      Creates a new empty pipeline to which algorithms can be added.

    • Method Summary

      Removes an algorithm from the pipeline.

      The number of algorithms in the pipeline.
